title: SDXL LoRA Training (Simpsons)
name: sdxl-lora-simpsons
setup: uv pip install --upgrade "datasets>=2.20.0" diffusers[torch] transformers accelerate peft bitsandbytes torchvision wandb transformerlab
description: Fine-tune Stable Diffusion XL (SDXL) on the Simpsons dataset using LoRA. Uses dual text-encoders and a lower learning rate (1e-5) for stability.
